timeline.message:
chore(engine): extend telemetry data with command count

* introduce command counter interceptor that keep track of all executed
command counts in the telemetry registry
* upon sending telemetry data including command counts, the counts are
reset

Related to CAM-12176

timeline.bodyText: I don't like this setter. It is much cleaner if we just get the respective object and then set it.
timeline.author: tasso94
tasso94

timeline.bodyText: In the current implementation, we don't need the AtomicLong since TelemetryRegistry#markOccurrence is synchronized.
